name: BakebakeBuster Kogasa
description:
This is a  (very) short arcade-esque game made for Touhou Fan Game Jam 7. 

Theme: Beware the umbrella left there forever

Exposition:

The increasing population of ghosts in the Myouren Temple Cemetery has caused the amount of visiting humans to dwindle, which means there are fewer targets for Kogasa to surprise. It's time for Kogasa to beat up some ghosts  so she can get back to the business of handing out spooks.

Gameplay:

Collect all the Power items and reach the exit to finish a level.

Attack ghosts by throwing Kogasa's umbrella. It will only hit enemies when it opens.

There are ten levels, with the last one containing a boss.

Unfortunately this game has no music because I didn't have enough time. oops

Controls: (gamepad controls are also supported)

Arrow keys = move

Z  = jump

X = throw umbrella / select
